summary: Keira is inspired by Keira Knightly. The save game is inside the Keep after following the Imperial.
descriptionHtml:
War Baby - Keira - Lvl 1 Female Imperial
============================================
Here\'s another one of my feeble attempts at re-creating a real person. This character save was inspired by Keira Knightly. It\'s hard to duplicate a real person using the presets that come with Skyrim, so the resemblance is fairly subtle.

I had a tough time picking a nose (no pun intended!). The one that looked best from the front (which I used) does not look the best from the side. There is another nose I almost went with (nose 13 I think) that looks much better from the side but is a little wider and throws off the resemblance more from the front. There\'s a link below to an article that explains how to change it if you like.


Required Mods
-------------
None. But your Keira won\'t look exactly like the one in the pictures if you don\'t use character enhancement mods. Here are a few I recommend:

Xenius\' Character Enhancement mods:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=726673

necKros\' Beauty Faces:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329

Better Females by BellaGail:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Younger Females by Chanon:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3227&navtag=file/images.php?id=3227&tab=3

I use BellaGail\'s no makeup skin texture and specular maps combined with Chanon\'s Younger Females normal maps in the screenshots.


How to Use It
-------------
Drop the Keira.ess file in your saves folder, usually located in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves. When you\'re done with it, delete the file.

Note: The save starts right inside the keep after following the Imperial soldier. I needed to use the interior lighting for final tweaking.


showracemenu notes
------------------
I\'ve included screencaps for the color settings I used.

For information about customizing Keira\'s appearance or changing her name, visit this link:

http://j-u-i-c-e.hubpages.com/_2ld6f4u0c40jc/hub/How-to-Change-Your-Characters-Appearance-and-Name-in-Skyrim
author: TheMagician
